name: 16 Cars, 16 Laps
description:
16 Cars, 16 Laps is a racing game where your speed gets higher every time you go through the finish line. Here's a challenge: Try to beat the two maps in 1st place and in less than 2 minutes! (120 seconds).

Controls:
(Controller):
A or X: Accelerate
B or Y: Brake
Left analog: Movement

(Keyboard):
Left and Right keys: Movement
Up key: Accelerate
Down key: Brake
